STARSELL

Покупайте Telegram Stars дешевле

Data Collection

  • 1.1. Data collection and processing apply to Users who have completed the authorization process on the Website.
  • 1.2. Registration and authorization on SterSell are conducted exclusively through the Telegram bot. During Telegram authorization, the service receives only publicly available user data, such as ID, name, username, and profile picture (avatar).
  • 1.3. User data generated during interaction with SterSell, such as statistics, cannot be deleted or altered upon the user's request.
  • 1.4. By authorizing on the Website, users agree to this Privacy Policy and consent to the processing of their data.

Data Storage, Collection, Transmission, and Processing

  • 2.1. Data is stored and processed on servers as long as necessary to ensure the service's functionality and access. Data is not transmitted to third parties in any non-transparent ways.
  • 2.2. SterSell utilizes analytics services, such as Google Analytics and Yandex.Metrica, which independently collect anonymized information about Website usage.

Cookie Policy

  • 3.1. What are cookies? Cookies are small text files placed on your computer by websites you visit. They are widely used to make websites function properly or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to website owners. The use of cookies is a standard practice for most websites.
  • 3.2. Managing cookies on your device: We use cookies to improve user experience. By browsing this website, you consent to the use of cookies. You can control and manage cookies through your browser. Please note that deleting or blocking cookies may affect the website's user interface and make some features unavailable.
  • 3.3. Managing cookies via browser: Most browsers allow you to view, delete, and block cookies from websites. If you delete all cookies, all your settings will be reset, including the ability to opt out of cookies, as this function itself requires storing a corresponding cookie on your device.
  • 3.4. Types of cookies used: The website "https://starsell.com/" uses session cookies (saved during your browser session), persistent cookies (stored after the session ends), first-party cookies (set by the website itself), and third-party cookies (set by other domains, such as analytics services).

Additional Provisions

  • 4.1. The service may send Users notifications about new products, services, special offers, and various events via personal messages in the Telegram bot. Users can opt out of these messages by contacting StarSell Support.
  • 4.2. This Policy may be amended at any time. SterSell reserves the right to make changes at its discretion and without prior notice to Users.
  • 4.3. The current version of this Policy is available on the Website at https://starsellpro.com/policy.html.
